sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SWEEP, in the ſea-language, is that part of the mould of a ſhip where ſhe begins to compaſs in the rung-heads. Alſo when the hauſer is dragged along the bottom of the ſea to recover any thing that is ſunk, they call this action s weeping for it.
